description: A lightweight state synchronization library for Web Extensions
primary_purpose: To simplify state management and synchronization across different parts of a Web Extension (Content Scripts, Service Worker, Devtools, Sidepanels, Popup, etc.)
key_features: Automatic state synchronization between extension contexts
Full TypeScript support with strong type inference

state_management_features.scoped_state: Support for shared state (Scope.Shared) and agent-specific state (Scope.Agent)
state_management_features.complex_types: Support for custom types and type assertions
